title: Newly Remodeled One Bedroom, Hardwood Floors, Close to Lake Merritt
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.
If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.
The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.
Newly Remodeled One Bedroom, Hardwood Floors, Close to Lake Merritt, $1,695.00
Photos are of a similar unit.
For an Appointment to View, please contact: Reda mobile:
One Cat Allowed (Additional deposit of $300.00 and photo of the cat required);
A very large newly remodeled one bedroom unit, NEAR Lake Merritt, in an attractive, clean, well managed building.
The unit offers wood floors in the living area.
The bathroom features a shower with bathtub.
The central courtyard is grassy and well landscaped.

The great location, centered in the Lake Merritt area, means you'll never be far from Lakeshore's unique shopping and restaurants, Saturday morning's Grand Lake Farmer's Market, and Grand Lake Theater.
Close to alternate transportation, AC and BART.
Walking distance to Grand Lake and Lakeshore shops, restaurants, coffee houses, bars, theater, Saturday Farmer's Market and transportation
Just a few blocks to Lake Merritt!
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13
Close to Downtown and Jack London Square
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
